CustomField.description: ... represents the Salesforce Developer Name for the Per-User Named Credential that will be used to authenticate Service Agents as Business Manager users with the rights to launch Order on Behalf Of shopping sessions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... represents the Salesforce Developer Name for the Per-User Named Credential that will be used to authenticate Service Agents as Business Manager users with the rights to launch Order on Behalf Of shopping sessions.
CustomField.label: OOBO Named Credential Developer Name
